name: MSCRMGetSolutionMissingComponents
description: Retrieves missing components for a solution from a PowerApps/CDS/Dynamics 365 environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: crmConnectionString
inputs.label: Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: For more information on format check the [docs](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/customer-engagement/developer/xrm-tooling/use-connection-strings-xrm-tooling-connect)

inputs.name: solutionFile
inputs.label: Solution File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the CRM solution zip file on the release agent machine

inputs.name: warnIfMissing
inputs.label: Warn If Missing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to generate a warning if missing components are found

inputs.name: errorIfMissing
inputs.label: Error If Missing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to generate an error if missing components are found
